casebody.data:
GENTILE
v.
TURKOLY. 2017-0865 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 25, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. On appellee's motion to strike. Motion denied as moot. O'Donnell, J., dissents and would grant the motion for reconsideration and deny the motion to strike. DeGenaro, J., not participating.
